ICLI

International Conference on Live Interfaces.

Timeline

September, 2015: Website launched on Github using Jekyll.
20 Nov, 2015: Call for Papers and Performances.
December 11th, 2015: EasyChair submissions system open.
February 22nd, 2016: Performance and Installation submissions deadline.
March 1st, 2016: Paper and Workshops submissions deadline.
April 11th, 2016: Notification of results.
May 11th, 2016: Camera ready deadline.
June 30th, 2016 : Conference.
